remarks: Axiom of Quantified Negation.  Axiom C5-2 of [Monk2] p. 113.  This axiom scheme is logically redundant (see ~ ax10w ) but is used as an auxiliary axiom to achieve metalogical completeness.  It means that ` x ` is not free in ` -. A. x ph ` .  (Contributed by NM, 21-May-2008.)  Use its alias ~ hbn1 instead.  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: ax-10 $p |- ( -. A. x ph -> A. x -. A. x ph ) $.
